descriptionlist.description:
Installed to the LockHTML directory: /var/mobile/Library/LockHTML

If you are using GroovyLock, move the widget folder from LockHTML directory to: /var/mobile/Library/Groovylock

Tweaks that you can use with:
LockHTML, XenHTML or GroovyLock

If you have any problems or questions, contact me on:
twitter: @Classicxii
email:classicxii42@gmail.com
